room_title: Escape room "Escape The Lost Pyramid VR" by Insomnia Escape Room DC in Washington, D.C.
room_description:
Escape The Lost Pyramid is a virtual reality escape game experience set in the world of Assassinâ€™s Creed Origins.
You will experience a larger-than-life adventure as if you were there, in 1928, in the gigantic pyramid of Nebka. Never alone, as part of a team (of 2 or 4 players), you become the hero and experience in total safety situations that would be far too dangerous or just impossible to live in real life.
